title: Can not run LeagueClient
body:
it started at last night, I clicked it and wait for a while, it did not appear, I realized that something wrong with my League. I decided to reinstall it. however, it still does not work, I was trig  The Hextech  Repair tool, it runs as error. could anyone help me solve this problem???? 

My computer:
AMD ryzen 5 1600x
GTX1080
DDR4 2400 16G
500GB SSD

replies.body: A security setting can cause your client to not launch.  Try out the steps in our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to restore access, as well as a pc restart in case something crashed in the background.
